data.name: Adept Movements
data.description: Graceful strike will cause the target to have 50% slower auto attack speed. You will gain 50% auto attack speed for the duration.

data.name: Aethyric Dissipation
data.description: Blurring Shock and Gryphon's Talon will always generate Hoeth's Favor in addition to their other effects.

data.name: Aethyric Grasp
data.description: Roots up to 9 enemies within 30 feet of you, making them unable to move for 4 seconds.

data.name: Balanced Accuracy
data.description: Increases your chance to critically hit by 15% for 6 seconds after consuming favor.

data.name: Bend the Winds
data.description: Gain a 300 unique bonus to elemental resistance. Gain a 169 unique bonus to corporeal and spiritual resistance.

data.name: Bladeshield
data.description: You become protected by a magical shell for a few moments which will strike back at any attacker for 300 + 0.6STR spiritual damage for 15 seconds.

data.name: Blurring Shock
data.description:
A powerful slash that deals X physical damage. This ability consumes all of your marks granting additional effects per mark. You will generate Khaine's Favor as long as one mark was consumed.
Mark of Khaine - For the next 15 seconds, each time the enemy is struck you will deal an additional Y spiritual damage to them. [Ailent]
Mark of Vaul - For the next 15 seconds, target loses 15% strikethrough. [Curse]
Mark of Hoeth - For the next 15 seconds, target has 33% longer cast times. [Hex]

data.name: Bolstering Enchantments
data.description: Whenever you cast Dazzling Blade, all groupmates within 100 feet will gain X health over 15 seconds. Whenever a blade blessing is triggered, you will deal X spiritual damage to the target over 15 seconds. Neither of these effects will refresh.

data.name: Boon of Vaul
data.description:
You call upon the magic in your blade to form a boon for groupmates within 100 feet for 15 seconds. This ability consumes all of your marks granting additional effects per mark. You will generate Vaul's Favor as long as one mark was consumed.
Mark of Khaine - +15% damage for up to 3 direct attacks.
Mark of Vaul - Gain a X damage absorption shield.
Mark of Hoeth - Gain a [11.25 * rank] ability bonus to spiritual resistance.

data.name: Calming Winds
data.description: Increase disrupt and dodge chance by 15% for 6 seconds after consuming favor.

data.name: Centuries of Training
data.description: Upon striking a target with a direct damage ability there is a 25% chance to inflict an additional X spiritual damage over 3 seconds. This damage scales with strength, ballistic skill, and intelligence.

data.name: Challenge
data.description: You challenge up to 9 opponents 65 feet in front of you. While challenged, your opponents will deal only 70% damage to everyone other than you. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: Champion's Challenge
data.description:
Both you and your target are held tightly in place for 10 seconds, and neither one of you can move.
This effect can not be dispelled or broken.

data.name: Crashing Wave
data.description: You launch two powerful blows dealing a total of X spiritual damage and knocking your opponent down for 3 seconds.

data.name: Crushing Advance
data.description:
A calculated shield maneuver that inflicts X physical damage to up to 9 enemies within 25 feet in front of you. You generate 5 action points every time you deal damage with this skill. This ability consumes all favor and grants additional effects per favor.
Khaine's Favor - You attack again for an additional X physical damage on each target.
You and up to 9 allie within 50 feet of you gain 10% block chance for 20 seconds,
All groupmates within 100 feet gain a [rank * 5] unique bonus to armor for 20 seconds.

data.name: Dazzling Blade
data.description:
Generate 30 action points. This ability consumes all favor granting a blade blessing per favor. Each blessing lasts 1 minute and has a 25% chance to trigger on direct damage.
Khaine's Favor - Deal X spiritual damage to the target.
Vaul's Favor - Groupmates within 100 feet gain an absoption shield for 10 seconds.
Hoeth's Favor - Up to 9 enemies within 30 feet take a [rank * 3] ability penalty to strength, ballistic skill, intelligence, toughness, initiative, weapon skill, or agility for 10 seconds. Groupmates within 100 feet gain an ability bonus equal to the same amount for 10 seconds.

data.name: Deep Incision
data.description: Quick Incision will now inflict an additional X spiritual damage over 8 seconds.

data.name: Demolishing Strike
data.description: A powerful melee attack that causes target to take a 1200 morale penalty to armor and deals 600 + 1.5 STR physical damage over 15 seconds.

data.name: Discerning Offense
data.description: Gain a 10% tactic bonus to parry strikethrough, dodge strikethrough, and disrupt strikethrough.

data.name: Distracting Bellow
data.description: A loud shout that startles up to 9 enemies within 30 feet of you, reducing their damage dealt by 50% for 7 seconds.

data.name: Diverse Footing
data.description: Gryphon's Lash and Ensorcelled Blow will now generate Mark of Vaul in addition to their other effects. The duration of Eagle's Flight is increased to 10 seconds.

data.name: Dragon's Talon
data.description:
You release two rending blows that deal X spiritual damage each. This ability consumes all of your marks granting additional effects per mark. You will generate Vaul's Favor as long as one mark was consumed.
Mark of Khaine - Remove 1 enchantment from the target.
For the next 10 seconds, the target deals 20% less damage.
Mark of Hoeth - Remove 1 ailment, curse, or hex from yourself.

data.name: Eagle's Flight
data.description: A guarded stance that improves your chance to parry by 25% for 5 seconds. You generate the Mark of Vaul.

data.name: Ensorcelled Blow
data.description: Call out the enchantment in your blade causing your next direct damaging attack within 10 seconds to deal X spiritual damage. You generate the Mark of Hoeth.

data.name: Ether Dance
data.description:
You focus on your target, slashing repeatedly for up to 3 seconds, striking them up to four times and dealing X physical damage and generating 8 action points with each hit. This ability consumes all favor and creates an additional effect per favor.
Khaine's Favor - Increases the number of hits to 7.
Vaul's Favor - You will take 90% less damage through out the channel.
Hoeth's Favor - The ability now deals spiritual damage.

data.name: Rush
data.description: Gain 25% increased movement speed for 5 seconds. The duration is increased by 1 second for every 50 action points you had. You become exerted losing all of your action points, career mechanic points, and morale. Your AP recovery and morale per second are set to 0 for the next 5 seconds.

data.name: Focused Offense
data.description: Taunt will now apply 10 stacks to the target.

data.name: Graceful Strike
data.description:
A swift attack that deals X physical damage over 10 seconds. Damage from this ability will generate double threat in NPCs. You generate 30 action points. This ability consumes all favor and creates an additional effect per favor.
Khaine's Favor - Damage value is tripled.
Vaul's Favor - Groupmates within 100 feet gain an absorption shield for 15 seconds.
Hoeth's Favor - The effect is applied to up to 8 other enemies within 30 feet of you.

data.name: Gryphon's Lash
data.description: A fierce attack that deals X physical damage. You generate the Mark of Khaine.

data.name: Guard
data.description:
You defend one of your groupmates and try to take attacks meant for them. As long as you are within 30 feet of them, you will take 33% of the damage meant for them.

Damage received from this ability cannot be avoided but you will mitigate it.

data.name: Guard of Steel
data.description: Remove up to 6 ailments, curses, and hexes from target groupmate. They will be healed for 200 for each effect removed.

data.name: Gusting Wind
data.description:
You execute a quick spin, rending the air around you and producing a magical shockwave that knocks back up to 9 enemies within 30 feet of you. This ability consumes all of your marks granting additional effects per mark. You will generate Hoeth's Favor as long as one mark was consumed.
Mark of Khaine - Enemies take X spiritual damage.
Mark of Vaul - Enemies are knocked farther away.
Mark of Hoeth - Enemies are no longer knocked back and the cooldown is removed. Up to 9 allies within 30 feet gain 20% movement speed for 3 seconds.

data.name: Hoeth's Tempering
data.description: An enchantment which calls upon the power of Hoeth, rendering your target silenced, unable to use magic for 4 seconds. Target will take X spiritual damage at the end of this effect.

data.name: Hold The Line!
data.description: While channeling, you will mark up to 48 enemies 65 feet in front of you and up to 9 allies 65 feet behind you. Enemies that are marked will deal 50% less area of effect damage to allies that are marked. This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of action points.

data.name: Immaculate Defense
data.description: All groupmates within 100 feet gain 25 stacks of immaculate defense for 20 seconds. Each stack grants 3% damage reduction. A stack is removed each time a target takes direct damage, and 5 stacks are removed if the target takes single target damage.

data.name: Impeccable Reactions
data.description: Each time you parry an attack, you will gain 100% parry for 5 seconds which is removed when you parry. This double parry can not occur more than once every 2 seconds.

data.name: Intimidating Blow
data.description:
An overpowering strike that deals X physical damage. You generate 30 action points. This ability consumes all favor and creates additional effects per favor.
Khaine's Favor - This ability now strikes 3 times.
Vaul's Favor - Target loses 15% critical chance for 10 seconds. [Curse]
Hoeth's Favor - Target loses 10 morale per second for 10 seconds. [Hex]

data.name: Isha's Protection
data.description: Heals are 20% more effective on you.

data.name: Juggernaut
data.description: You become filled with unstoppable power, removing all snaring, rooting, silencing, and disarming effects.

data.name: Lingering Intimidation
data.description: Intimidating Blow will now strike 5 times under the effect of Khaine's Favor and the duration of all effects it generates is increased to 20 seconds.

data.name: Perfect Defenses
data.description: Increase block and parry chances by 8% for 6 seconds after consuming favor.

data.name: Poised Attacks
data.description: You will gain 30 action points whenever you consume marks. This effect can only happen once per skill.

data.name: Potent Enchantments
data.description: You gain a tactic bonus to willpower equal to 100% of your weapon skill from items.

data.name: Quick Incision
data.description: A rapid slash to your opponents legs that snares them by 30% for 8 seconds.

data.name: Raze
data.description: For the next 7 seconds, up to 48 enemies within 65 feet frontal cone will take a 800 morale penalty to armor and a 300 morale penalty to all resistances. This effect can stack up to 3 times per target.

data.name: Redirected Force
data.description:
Deals X physical damage. This ability consumes all of your marks granting additional effects per mark. You will generate Khaine's Favor as long as one mark was consumed.
Mark of Khaine - Enemy takes X physical damage over 8 seconds and the AP cost of their skills is increased by 50% for the duration. [Hex]
Mark of vaul - For the next 15 seconds, whenever you defend against an attack, you will deal X spiritual damage to up to 9 enemies within 30 feet of you. [Enchantment]
Mark of Hoeth - For the next 20 seconds, you will gain a [rank * 5] ability bonus to willpower. [Blessing]

data.name: Rugged
data.description: Gain a 160 unique bonus to toughness.

data.name: Shadow Blades
data.description: Target enemy takes a (rank * 7.5) morale penalty to spiritual resistance and loses 10 morale per second for 30 seconds.

data.name: Shield of Valor
data.description: Groupmates within 100 feet are protected by a magical barrier for 30 seconds which will absorb up to 4500 damage.

data.name: Shield Wall
data.description: All groupmates within 100 feet gain a 40% increased chance to block and a 25% increased chance to parry, dodge, and disrupt for 10 seconds. This effect can stack up to 2 times.

data.name: Taunt
data.description: You enrage your opponent, interrupting any currently building abilities. While taunted your opponent will take 30% more damage from your attacks. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: Throw
data.description: A basic throwing attack that inflicts X physical damage. You generate 15 action points. You will deal Y physical damage if the target is below 20% health.

data.name: Unstoppable Juggernaut
data.description: Juggernaut's cooldown is reduced to 20 seconds.

data.name: Vaul's Buffer
data.description: The value of the absorbs generated by Graceful Strike, Boon of Vaul, and Dazzling Blade are increased by 100%.

data.name: Wall of Darting Steel
data.description: You spin your greatsword with astounding speed forming a wall of steel between you and your opponent. Increasing your chance to dodge, disrupt and parry attacks by 50%.

data.name: Weapon Mastery
data.description: Gain 50% auto attack damage and increases the DPS contribution of your weapon towards Path of Khaine skills by 50%.

data.name: Whirling Geyser
data.description: Up to 48 enemies within 40 feet are knocked high into the air.

data.name: Whispering Wind
data.description:
Deal X spiritual damage twice to up to 9 enemies within 30 feet. Generate 3 action points each time an enemy takes damage. This ability consumes all favore and creates an additional effect per favor.
Khaine's Favor - Ability now hits 4 times.
For the next 10 seconds, groupmates within 100 feet gain 100% parry, dodge, and disrupt until they avoid 2 attacks.
For the next 10 seconds, groupmates within 100 feet have their cooldowns reduced by 10 seconds.

data.name: Wings of Heaven
data.description: You magically leap through the air towards your target. When you land, up to 9 enemies around you will become snared for 10 seconds, reducing their run speed by 60%.

data.name: Wrath of Hoeth
data.description:
The magic from your blade is released in a staggering explosion that causes up to 9 opponents within 30 feet to take a [7.5 * rank] ability penalty to spirit resistance for 10 seconds. This ability consumes all of your marks granting additional effects per mark. You will generate Hoeth's Favor as long as one mark was consumed.
Mark of Khaine - Ability now deals X spiritual damage to each target.
Mark of Vaul - Adds a 10% movement speed reduction to the debuff.
Mark of hoeth - Duration is increased to 20 seconds.
